user_input: Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications. Do not access any PLEXOS database for this run; operate on external data files only.

function_args.user_input: Generate hourly hydrogen demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 scenarios NT, NT_HE, and NT_LE for years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050. Split the nodes. Do not access any PLEXOS database. Prepare outputs for subsequent TST export.

tasks.description: Generate hourly hydrogen demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 scenarios NT, NT_HE, and NT_LE for years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050 with nodes split; produce structured time series outputs suitable for TST export.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', determine the scenarios (NT, NT_HE, NT_LE), years (2030, 2035, 2040, 2050), and apply node-splitting. No PLEXOS DB access; operate entirely on external/intermediate files.

tasks.description: Convert the generated hourly hydrogen demand profiles from the previous task into TST-format workbooks for the TYNDP 2026 scenarios and years.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the generated hourly profiles from prior tasks and export them to TST format for carrier 'hydrogen'.
